title: A Google Calendar Invite, a Hidden Prompt, and a New Kind of AI Security Problem
summary: A potential exploit in Google's AI assistant, Gemini, shows that attackers are using natural language processing to bypass security controls and expose sensitive user data. The exploit underscores the need for robust security measures in AI applications in customer service.
